review: Very convenient. I recently got a fire TV stick after having surgery where I was bed ridden for a few weeks, and I never ran out of things to do with this little guy. I linked my Amazon prime TV account as well as my netflix, and there are a bunch of apps and games you can download on it too! Great little device. The only con I have is that there's not an adequate phone mirroring app yet, which I miss from my old Apple TV.
